title: Active Immune
description: Looking for vitamins & supplements to boost your immune system? Active Immune supplies elderberry, hops and vitamin D3, to help boost your immune system.
cleaned_text: PRODUCTS PRODUCT DESCRIPTION IMMUNE SUPPORT FORMULA An active and healthy immune system is more important in these times than ever. Active Immune tablets can help you promote this by daily taking the best nature has to offer of immune supporting ingredients. Active Immune tablets combine vitamin D3 at 100% recommended daily value, with extracts of elderberry, hops, and sea buckthorn, all known to support a healthy immune system. SUPPLEMENT FACTS Daily dose (adults): Take 1 tablet a day with food. Cautions & warnings: Consult a doctor prior to use if you are pregnant or breastfeeding or if you have depression and/or related diseases. Avoid taking with alcohol or products that cause drowsiness. Discontinue use and consult your doctor if symptoms persist or worsen or any adverse reactions occur. Keep out of reach of children. Do not use if blister package (inner foil) has been opened or tampered with. It is not recommended to exceed this dosage. Store in a cool, dry place. product is free of: sugar, salt, gluten, yeast, soy and dairy products and is formulated without the use of preservatives, flavors or colors of any kind. Manufactured in the EU, under pharmaceutical control of purity and content. Not tested on animals. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.
